snippet.title: JANE - Anyone can be scared // OFFICIAL TEASER
snippet.description:
An old friend invited you for tea, but once you get there, you quickly realize something’s wrong. Where’s Jane?
Jane is missing. The only way to find out what’s going on is to search for clues and explore the place. Resolve puzzles, read books and hope for the best. It might lead you somewhere.

ABOUT THE GAME:
Experience an atmospheric horror game inspired by some very precious first-person point & click games of the 90’s: Shivers, Myst, Byzantine: the Betrayal and RAMA. Old-style graphics and an original soundtrack will bring you to a place where normal life isn't always safe.

FEATURES:
150+ screens to explore
About 1-2 hour of gameplay
A mysterious and weird narrative experience
Puzzles and mysteries to solve
90’s inspired digitized graphics
An original soundtrack of 5 songs
Integration of videos
1024 x 768 screen resolution
Save/Load your game anytime
Inventory system

Credits:
Voice actor: Marissa Lenti
Music: Antoine Bouchard-Côtes
SFX: freesound.org

instagram: @nevergrownupgames
twitter: @nvrgrwnupgames
https://nevergrownupgames.itch.io/jane
https://gamejolt.com/games/jane/438549
